name: Tournament Ark (Jaylen)
description:
Everyone loves to watch the tournament arc where you can see the most powerful characters face off against each other, so why not bring them all out to one location to do battle at sea? You are one of these warriors, a resourceful fighter who slays any that dares to underestimate them. Choose the weapons that you will go into battle with to suit the situation, and dodge the onslaught of projectiles from your enemies while you find your opportunity to strike back.

This game was created by one person who wanted to combine the strategic nature of deck builders and the real time decision making present in bullet hells. It is still in an early  build and new features are almost always being worked on. Comments and requests on what should be added are more than welcome, and any critiques will be taken into consideration as well.

*Current build only includes the Sword and Heart cards, future versions will contain far more variety.
